question.title: Obtaining a concrete implementation of RepositorySystem
question.body:
From Maven Resolver javadocs:

Note that obtaining a concrete implementation of this interface (e.g. via dependency injection, service locator, etc.) is dependent on the application and its specific needs, please consult the online documentation for examples and directions on booting the system.

How do I obtain an instance of RepositorySystem? Where's that "online documentation" mentioned, which I assume to be an official part of the Maven Resolver product? Googling it does not reveal anything.

I'm not writing a Maven plugin so even if I could use Maven's own DI, stock examples won't work. I'm also interested in using the latest version of Aether and not rely on deprecated code, so e.g. DefaultServiceLocator should not be considered.
